Interface IModelControlAdapter<TDropListItem1,TDropListItem2>

Type Parameters:
TDropListItem1 - : the type of options in the primary drop lists.
TDropListItem2 - the type of options in the secondary drop lists.
public interface IModelControlAdapter<TDropListItem1,TDropListItem2>
The view to model control adapter.

    • combineStrategies

      Return a new object to put on both lists, given 2 items from the list.
      Parameters:
      selectedItem1 - : an object from one drop list
      selectedItem2 - : an object from the other drop list
      Returns:
      an object to put back on both lists.

    • MAKE_NULL

      static <TDropListItem1, TDropListItem2> IModelControlAdapter<TDropListItem1,TDropListItem2> MAKE_NULL()
      Default null object for the adapter.
      Type Parameters:
      TDropListItem1 - the type of options in the algo lists
      TDropListItem2 - the type of options in the ball type list
      Returns:
      an instance of the adapter that does nothing.
